title: Independent Trainer and Consultant
bio: Cristian teaches Microsoft SQL Server and he is also an author, a community leader, a public speaker and a proud Toastmasters member. In his spare time he is involved in the West Coast Swing community being a teacher certified by GSDTA. He is also a mentor at the Informal School of IT
shortBio: Cristian teaches Microsoft SQL Server and he is also an author, a community leader, a public speaker and a proud Toastmasters member.
name: Cristian Lefter
